public class ObservationManager
extends org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.AbstractLogEnabled
implements org.apache.lenya.cms.observation.ObservationRegistry, org.apache.avalon.framework.thread.ThreadSafe, org.apache.avalon.framework.service.Serviceable

Observation manager. Works as an observation registry and sends the notifications.
